ARABIC: وَقَالُوا۟ لَن نُّؤْمِنَ لَكَ حَتَّىٰ تَفْجُرَ لَنَا مِنَ ٱلْأَرْضِ يَنۢبُوعًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They say, 'We will not believe you until you make a spring gush out from the earth for us;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And say: "We will not believe you until you make a spring of water gush forth from the earth for us;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: They said: "We shall not accept your Message until you cause a spring to gush forth for us from the earth;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They have said, "We shall never believe you until you cause a spring to gush forth from the earth,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And they said, “We will not accept faith in you, until you cause a spring to gush forth from the earth for us.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And they say: "We shall not believe in you, until you cause a spring to gush forth from the earth for us;"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And they say: We will by no means believe in you until you cause a fountain to gush forth from the earth for us.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: They say, 'We will not believe thee till thou makest a spring to gush forth from the earth for us,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And they say: We will not put faith in thee till thou cause a spring to gush forth from the earth for us;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: They declare, "We will never believe in you until you cause a spring to flow for us from the earth;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And they say: we shall by no means believe in thee until thou causest for us to gush forth from the earth a foun tain.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: They say, ‘We will not believe you until you make a spring gush forth for us from the ground.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: They say: "We shall not believe in thee, until thou cause a spring to gush forth for us from the earth,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And they say: "We shall not believe in you (O Muhammad SAW), until you cause a spring to gush forth from the earth for us;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: They say: 'We will not believe in you until you make a spring gush from the earth for us,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And they said, “We will not believe in you unless you make a spring burst from the ground for us.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And they say, "We will not believe you until you break open for us from the ground a spring.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [17:90] And they say (wa-qālū is a supplement to abā [illā], ‘insist on’), ‘We will not believe you until you make gush forth for us from the ground a spring, from which water issues forth;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And they say) i.e. 'Abdullah Ibn Umayyah al-Makhzumi and his host: (We will not put faith in thee) we will not believe you (till thou cause a spring to gush forth from the earth for us) from the earth of Mecca for us;
